title: SonarQube Scanner Executor
description: Scans and uploads test coverage based on SonarQube options (https://docs.sonarqube.org/latest/analysis/analysis-parameters/)

projectKey.description: The project's unique key. Allowed characters are: letters, numbers, -, _, . and :, with at least one non-digit.

projectName.description: Name of the project that will be displayed on the web interface.

qualityGate.description: Forces the analysis step to poll the SonarQube instance and wait for the Quality Gate status.

qualityGateTimeout.description: Sets the number of seconds that the scanner should wait for a report to be processed.

skipImplicitDeps.description: Skips adding implicit dependencies to the project graph analysis

testInclusions.description: Comma-delimited list of test file path patterns to be included in analysis. When set, only test files matching the paths set here will be included in analysis

verbose.description: Add more detail to both client and server-side analysis logs
